title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2011 (S.I. No. 219 of 2011)), with the
heading: (1) These Rules may be cited as the Pharmaceutical Society of Ireland
text_raw:
1. 

(1) These Rules may be cited as the Pharmaceutical Society of Ireland 

(Registration) (Amendment) (No. 2) Rules 2020. 

(2) The collective citation “the Pharmaceutical Society of Ireland 

(Registration) Rules 2008 to 2020” includes these Rules.

title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2011 (S.I. No. 219 of 2011)), with the
heading: 2. These Rules come into operation on 1 January 2021.
text_raw: 2. These Rules come into operation on 1 January 2021.

title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2011 (S.I. No. 219 of 2011)), with the
heading: In these Rules “Principal Rules” means the Pharmaceutical Society of
text_raw:
3. 

In these Rules “Principal Rules” means the Pharmaceutical Society of 

Ireland (Registration) Rules 2008 (S.I. No. 494 of 2008).

title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2011 (S.I. No. 219 of 2011)), with the
heading: 4. Rule 18 (as amended by Rule 4 of the Pharmaceutical Society of
text_raw:
4. Rule 18 (as amended by Rule 4 of the Pharmaceutical Society of 
Ireland (Registration) (Amendment) Rules 2020 (S.I. No. 316 of 2020)) of the 
Principal Rules is amended— 

(a) 

in paragraph (1), by substituting “The Council” for “Subject to 
the provisions of this Rule, the Council”, 

(b) 

in paragraph (2), by substituting “may” for “shall”, 

(c) 

(d) 

by deleting paragraph (2A), and 

in paragraph (3), by substituting “paragraph (1)” for “paragraph 
(2A)”.
text_norm: 4 rule 18 (as amended rule 4 pharmaceutical society ireland (registration) (amendment) rule 2020 (s.i no 316 2020)) principal rule amended-- (a) paragraph (1) substituting council subject provision rule council (b) paragraph (2) substituting may shall (c) (d) deleting paragraph (2a) paragraph (3) substituting paragraph (1) paragraph (2a)

title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2011 (S.I. No. 219 of 2011)), with the
heading: 5. Paragraph 10(d) of Schedule 4 to the Principal Rules is amended by
text_raw:
5. Paragraph 10(d) of Schedule 4 to the Principal Rules is amended by 
inserting “except in the case of a qualification which would have been 
automatically recognised under the Professional Qualifications Directive 
before 31 December 2020, and the training for which had commenced before 
that date,”, before “the detailed syllabus”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 4th December, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 I, STEPHEN DONNELLY, Minister for Health, consent to the making of the 
foregoing Rules. 

[563] 3 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 26 November 2020 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
 Minister for Health. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Council of the 
Pharmaceutical Society of Ireland, 

16 November 2020. 

JOANNE KISSANE 

President. 

NIALL BYRNE 
Registrar. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [563]
